get.description: Lists available operations for the Microsoft.VirtualMachineImages provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the list of available operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the VM image templates associated with the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the specified run output for the specified image template resource

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription Id forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: imageTemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the image Template

parameters.name: runOutputName
parameters.description: The name of the run output

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.
The target of the particular error.

ImageTemplate.description: Image template is an ARM resource managed by Microsoft.VirtualMachineImages provider

name.description: Friendly Name to provide context on what this customization step does

type.description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

ImageTemplateCustomizer.description: Describes a unit of image customization

artifactTags.description: Tags that will be applied to the artifact once it has been created/updated by the distributor.

runOutputName.description: The name to be used for the associated RunOutput.

destination.description: The absolute path to a file (with nested directory structures already created) where the file (from sourceUri) will be uploaded to in the VM

sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the file provided in the sourceUri field above

sourceUri.description: The URI of the file to be uploaded for customizing the VM. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

ImageTemplateFileCustomizer.description: Uploads files to VMs (Linux, Windows). Corresponds to Packer file provisioner

type.description: The type of identity used for the image template. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the image template.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the image template. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 Checksum of the ISO image.

sourceUri.description: URI to get the ISO image. This URI has to be accessible to the resource provider at the time of the image template creation.

ImageTemplateIsoSource.description: Describes an image source that is an installation ISO. Currently only supports Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2-7.5 ISO's.

endTime.description: End time of the last run (UTC)

message.description: Verbose information about the last run state

startTime.description: Start time of the last run (UTC)

ImageTemplateLastRunStatus.description: Describes the latest status of running an image template

ImageTemplateListResult.description: The result of List image templates operation

imageId.description: Resource Id of the Managed Disk Image

location.description: Azure location for the image, should match if image already exists

ImageTemplateManagedImageDistributor.description: Distribute as a Managed Disk Image.

imageId.description: ARM resource id of the managed image in customer subscription

ImageTemplateManagedImageSource.description: Describes an image source that is a managed image in customer subscription.

ImageTemplatePlatformImageSource.description: Describes an image source from [Azure Gallery Images](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/compute/virtualmachineimages).

inline.description: Array of PowerShell commands to execute

runElevated.description: If specified, the PowerShell script will be run with elevated privileges

scriptUri.description: URI of the PowerShell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the power shell script provided in the scriptUri field above

validExitCodes.description: Valid exit codes for the PowerShell script. [Default: 0]

ImageTemplatePowerShellCustomizer.description: Runs the specified PowerShell on the VM (Windows). Corresponds to Packer powershell provisioner. Exactly one of 'scriptUri' or 'inline' can be specified.

buildTimeoutInMinutes.description: Maximum duration to wait while building the image template. Omit or specify 0 to use the default (4 hours).

customize.description: Specifies the properties used to describe the customization steps of the image, like Image source etc

distribute.description: The distribution targets where the image output needs to go to.

ImageTemplateProperties.description: Describes the properties of an image template

restartCheckCommand.description: Command to check if restart succeeded [Default: '']

restartCommand.description: Command to execute the restart [Default: 'shutdown /r /f /t 0 /c "packer restart"']

restartTimeout.description: Restart timeout specified as a string of magnitude and unit, e.g. '5m' (5 minutes) or '2h' (2 hours) [Default: '5m']

ImageTemplateRestartCustomizer.description: Reboots a VM and waits for it to come back online (Windows). Corresponds to Packer windows-restart provisioner

galleryImageId.description: Resource Id of the Shared Image Gallery image

replicationRegions.description: A list of regions that the image will be replicated to

imageVersionId.description: ARM resource id of the image version in the shared image gallery

ImageTemplateSharedImageVersionSource.description: Describes an image source that is an image version in a shared image gallery.

inline.description: Array of shell commands to execute

scriptUri.description: URI of the shell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the shell script provided in the scriptUri field

ImageTemplateShellCustomizer.description: Runs a shell script during the customization phase (Linux). Corresponds to Packer shell provisioner. Exactly one of 'scriptUri' or 'inline' can be specified.

type.description: Specifies the type of source image you want to start with.

ImageTemplateSource.description: Describes a virtual machine image source for building, customizing and distributing

tags.description: The user-specified tags associated with the image template.

ImageTemplateUpdateParameters.description: Parameters for updating an image template.

ImageTemplateVhdDistributor.description: Distribute via VHD in a storage account.

vmSize.description: Size of the virtual machine used to build, customize and capture images. Omit or specify empty string to use the default (Standard_D1_v2).

ImageTemplateVmProfile.description: Describes the virtual machine used to build, customize and capture images

errorDetail.description: The internal error message or exception dump.

display.title: The object that describes the operation.

description.title: The friendly name of the operation

operation.title: The operation type.
operation.description: For example: read, write, delete, or listKeys/action

provider.title: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.title: The resource type on which the operation is performed.

origin.title: The intended executor of the operation.

OperationListResult.title: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.title: The URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.title: The list of operations supported by the resource provider.

message.description: Verbose error message about the provisioning failure

provisioningErrorCode.description: Error code of the provisioning failure

ProvisioningError.description: Describes the error happened when create or update an image template

RunOutput.description: Represents an output that was created by running an image template.

RunOutputCollection.description: The result of List run outputs operation

artifactId.description: The resource id of the artifact.

artifactUri.description: The location URI of the artifact.

RunOutputProperties.description: Describes the properties of a run output

ImageTemplateNameParameter.name: imageTemplateName
ImageTemplateNameParameter.description: The name of the image Template

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

RunOutputNameParameter.name: runOutputName
RunOutputNameParameter.description: The name of the run output

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription Id forms part of the URI for every service call.
